name: gamerl
title: GameRL - AI Training Infrastructure
author: Arkavo
description: Multi-agent reinforcement learning infrastructure for Factorio. Enables AI agents to observe game state, execute actions, and train policies for factory optimization, automation, and combat scenarios. SETUP: Enable RCON in config.ini (local-rcon-socket=127.0.0.1:27015, local-rcon-password=gamerl) then host a multiplayer game.
